resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 

I love fishsticks. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in my stomach or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

I like eating fish, too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Sticks on fish - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in New England, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own fishsticks. 
You should ask someone else about fishing, though.
